id: FREE TV Show and Movie Tracker Notion Template
name: FREE TV Show and Movie Tracker Notion Template
description: Never forget what you've watched ever again with this free notion template! Track all your TV shows and movies that you're watching, currently watching or would like to watch.This template includes:→ Add any TV show or movie you would like→ Sort them into categories based on what you've watched, haven't watched, currently watching, etc.→ View how many TV shows & movies you've watched in a year→ Cultivate a list of things you would like to watch and what you want to watch nextPlease noteThis
features: This is a digital product. NO physical item will be shipped to you. After Gumroad receives the payment, you will receive a link to your notion template.; All sales are final and non refundable due to this being a digital product. Cancellations and exchanges are not accepted.; This template is for PERSONAL USE ONLY. You cannot resell, reproduce or share this template in any way.
